Monitoring

Example configuration:

<Monitor name="Receiver Shutdown" destinations="MONITOR_LOG">
    <AlarmTrigger severity="WARNING">
        <Event>Receiver Shutdown</Event>
    </AlarmTrigger>
    <ClearingTrigger severity="WARNING">
        <Event>Receiver Shutdown</Event>
    </ClearingTrigger>
 </Monitor>

Syntax
Copy
<Monitor name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of the object.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
destinations	text	-
raised	boolean	-
additionalHitCount	number	-
type	options	-
Available Options: TECHNICAL, FUNCTIONAL, HEARTBEAT, CLEARING
alarmSeverity	options	-
Available Options: HARMLESS, WARNING, CRITICAL, FATAL
active	text	-
If defined and empty or false,
